General.Name: Omai Gold Mines Corp
General.Description: Omai Gold Mines Corp. engages in the exploration and evaluation of mineral assets. It explores for gold and precious metals. The company holds a 100% interest in the Omai prospecting license that covers an area of 4,590 acres, including the past producing Omai Gold mine located in the Potaro mining district of Guyana, as well as adjoining Eastern flats mining permits. Omai Gold Mines Corp. is based in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 82 Richmond Street East, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5C 1P1
